name: Kuzuhamon
description: Kuzuhamon is a tall humanoid Digimon. Most of its body is covered in black, skin-tight fabric. It wears knee-high, purple and yellow boots with the yin-yang symbol on the instep, and purple and yellow gauntlets with the yin-yang symbol displayed on the backs of the hands. It also wears a purple cuirass and shoulder guards (the latter of which have the yin-yang symbol emblazoned upon them), and a purple, traditional kitsune -style half mask which obscures its human-like face. It also has ankle-length black hair tied into pigtails. It wields a long, silver staff with several rings adorning the tip called Shakujou. Its gloves bear the Zero Unit .
